meta.title: Home - Lisle CUSD 202

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home fsHasTheme2

img.alt: Junior High Boys Basketball team with championship plaque

div.noscript: You must have JavaScript enabled in your web browser to use the media player.

div.title: Lisle 202 Proudly Presents the 2020 District Art Show

img.alt: Lisle 202 Proudly Presents the 2020 District Art Show

div.a: Lisle 202 Proudly Presents the 2020 District Art Show

div.p: We invite you to enjoy our 2020 District Art Show Virtually this year

article.a: Read more about Lisle 202 Proudly Presents the 2020 District Art Show

span.title: Lisle Elementary School Calendar of Events
Lisle Elementary School Calendar of Events
Lisle Elementary School Calendar of Events
Lisle Elementary School Calendar of Events

img.alt: LJHS science students create roller coaster model

p.a: Learn more about registering for Lisle 202 schools here!

div.a: Lisle CUSD 202 continues to focus on preparing our students to be competitive in college and career endeavors. Lisle’s curriculum, aligned with CCSS and tailored to the needs of our students, provides the tools and skills necessary for success in life.
Lisle High School students have the opportunity to participate in athletic teams for Fall, Winter and Spring Seasons.
Our schools are full of engaging activities and events throughout the school year. Take a look at what's going on!

img.alt: Class of students eating lunch in the Tate Woods lunchroom

div.a: Lisle 202 offers school lunches that provide healthy choices.

img.alt: Band on track at football game

div.a: Lisle District 202 students participate in the arts beginning in the elementary grades and continue through high school.

Lisle Elementary School is now open serving students in grades PreKindergarten through 5th.
Learn More

p.a: Vision 202 is a collaborative conversation between Lisle District 202 and its community.
